meanings.definition: Relating to old age or elderly people.
meanings.sent1: The geriatric man enjoyed his daily walks in the park.
meanings.sent2: The nursing home specializes in geriatric care for the elderly residents.
meanings.sent3: The geriatric cat took its time climbing up the stairs, just like its owner.
meanings.sent4: The geriatric building showed signs of wear and tear, much like its aging inhabitants.
meanings.sent5: The geriatric population deserves respect and proper healthcare in their golden years.

meanings.definition: An elderly person, especially one receiving special care.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother is a geriatric who loves to knit blankets for us.
meanings.sent2: The geriatric at the nursing home always has a smile for visitors.
meanings.sent3: The geriatric at the bingo game surprised everyone with her quick moves.
meanings.sent4: The geriatric in the wheelchair is a wise storyteller with a twinkle in his eye.
meanings.sent5: The geriatric in the park feeds the birds every morning, spreading joy around.
